env-entry.env-entry-value: select a.pico_no,a.mfg_nam,b.media_type_desc,a.addr_1,a.addr_2, a.city,a.state,a.zip,a.cntct_frst_nam,a.cntct_last_nam, a.tlphn,a.email,a.fax,a.cntct_addr_1,a.cntct_addr_2,a.cntct_city,a.cntct_state,a.cntct_zip,a.title from t_rbate_mfg a,t_media_type b where a.media_type_id = b.media_type_id order by a.pico_no asc

update t_rbate_mfg set mfg_nam = ?,addr_1 = ?,addr_2 = ?,city = ?,state = ?,zip = ?,tlphn = ?,cntct_frst_nam = ?,cntct_last_nam = ?,fax = ?,email = ?,cntct_addr_1 = ?,cntct_addr_2 = ?,cntct_city = ?, cntct_state = ?,cntct_zip = ?,title = ?,media_type_id = (select media_type_id from t_media_type where upper(media_type_desc) = ? and rownum = 1) where pico_no = ?

select a.pico_no,a.cntrc_gid,a.cntrc_id,b.rbate_cycle_desc,a.notes,a.cntrc_eff_date,a.cntrc_end_date from t_cntrc a,t_rbate_cycle_type b where a.rbate_cycle_type_id = b.rbate_cycle_type_id and a.pico_no = ? order by a.cntrc_id asc
select a.bskt_gid,a.bskt_nam,a.eff_date,a.end_date,a.mrkt_shr_type,a.cntrl_no,b.cntrc_id from t_bskt a,t_cntrc b where a.cntrc_gid = ? and a.cntrc_gid = b.cntrc_gid
insert into t_bskt(bskt_gid,cntrc_gid,bskt_nam,eff_date,end_date,mrkt_shr_type,cntrl_no, usr_gid) (select ?,b.cntrc_gid,?,?,?,?,?,? from t_cntrc b where upper(trim(b.cntrc_id)) = ? )

update t_bskt set cntrc_gid = (select a.cntrc_gid from t_cntrc a where upper(trim(a.cntrc_id)) = ?),bskt_nam = ?,eff_date = ?,end_date = ?,mrkt_shr_type = ?,cntrl_no = ?,usr_gid = ? where bskt_gid = ?
select mrkt_shr_type from t_mrkt_shr_type order by mrkt_shr_type
select rbate_id from t_rbate_id order by rbate_id
select lcm_code from t_lcm order by lcm_code
select nabp_code from v_phmcy where nabp_code like ?

select a.rbate_cycle_gid, b.rbate_cycle_desc,a.cycle_start_date,a.cycle_end_date, a.rbate_cycle_status from t_rbate_cycle a,t_rbate_cycle_type b where a.rbate_cycle_type_id = b.rbate_cycle_type_id ORDER BY a.rbate_cycle_type_id desc, rbate_cycle_gid
select distinct excpt_rsn from t_excpt_code where screen_code = 1
select distinct excpt_rsn from t_excpt_code where screen_code = 2
select distinct excpt_rsn from t_excpt_code where screen_code = 3
select b.rllp_gid,trim(a.rollp_nam) rollp_nam,trim(b.rllp_type) rllp_type,trim(b.rllp_value) rllp_value from t_rllp a, t_rllp_rule b where a.rllp_gid = b.rllp_gid and b.bskt_gid = ?
delete from t_rllp_rule where rllp_gid = ? and bskt_gid = ? and upper(trim(rllp_type)) = ? and upper(trim(rllp_value)) = ?
select a.glbl_excpt_gid,a.rbate_id,a.nabp_code,b.excpt_rsn from t_glbl_excpt a, t_excpt_code b where a.excpt_id = b.excpt_id
insert into t_glbl_excpt (glbl_excpt_gid,rbate_id,excpt_id,nabp_code) (select ?,?, b.excpt_id, ? from t_excpt_code b where upper(trim(b.excpt_rsn)) = ? and rownum = 1)

select a.bskt_drug_gid,a.drug_gid,b.ndc_code,a.cntrc_flag,a.mrkt_shr_flag,a.eff_date,a.end_date,b.strgh_desc,b.pkg_desc,b.dsg_form, b.route_name, b.drug_class,b.gnrc_prdct_ind,b.unit_dsg_code,b.inst_prdct_ind,b.rpkg_ind, a.prmtd_drug_denom_exclude_flag from t_bskt_drug a, dma_rbate2.v_drug_remote b where a.drug_gid = b.drug_gid and a.brnd_nam = ? and a. bskt_gid = ?
insert into t_bskt_drug (bskt_drug_gid,drug_gid,bskt_gid,cntrc_flag,mrkt_shr_flag,brnd_nam,eff_date,end_date, prmtd_drug_denom_exclude_flag, usr_gid) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
update t_bskt_drug set cntrc_flag= ?,mrkt_shr_flag = ?,eff_date =?,end_date = ?, prmtd_drug_denom_exclude_flag = ?, usr_gid = ? where bskt_drug_gid = ?

select a.drug_gid, a.ndc_code, a.strgh_desc, a.pkg_desc,a.dsg_form, a.route_name, a.drug_class,a.gnrc_prdct_ind,a.unit_dsg_code,a.inst_prdct_ind,a.rpkg_ind from dma_rbate2.v_drug_remote a where brand_name = ? minus select a.drug_gid, b.ndc_code, b.strgh_desc, b.pkg_desc,b.dsg_form, b.route_name, b.drug_class,b.gnrc_prdct_ind,b.unit_dsg_code,b.inst_prdct_ind,b.rpkg_ind from t_bskt_drug a, dma_rbate2.v_drug_remote b where a.brnd_nam = ? and a.bskt_gid = ? and a.drug_gid = b.drug_gid
select brnd_nam,cntrc_flag,eff_date,end_date from t_bskt_brnd where bskt_gid = ?
update t_bskt_brnd set eff_date =?,end_date = ?, usr_gid = ? where bskt_gid = ? and brnd_nam = ?
select distinct brand_name from dma_rbate2.v_drug_remote where upper(brand_name) like ?

select rbate_id,pk_common.get_reason(excpt_id) excpt_rsn,rbate_lvl_rule_gid,rbate_lvl_id,pk_common.get_external_id(frmly_gid) frmly_extnl_id,lcm_code,nabp_code,prior_athzn_flag, r.list_gid, l.list_name from dma_rbate2.t_rbate_lvl_rule r, dma_rbate2.t_list l where r.list_gid = l.list_gid(+) and bskt_gid = ?
select tier_id,tier_gid,mrkt_tier_pctg from t_tier_asgn where upper(trim(rbate_lvl_id)) = ? and bskt_gid = ?
update t_tier_asgn set tier_id = ?,mrkt_tier_pctg = ? where tier_gid = ?
select excpt_id from t_excpt_code b where upper(trim(b.excpt_rsn)) = ? and rownum = 1
delete from t_bskt_frmly where bskt_gid= ? and frmly_gid = ? and eff_date = ? and end_date = ?

select a.ndc_excpt_gid,b.excpt_rsn,c.ndc_code,d.frmly_extnl_id,a.eff_date,a.end_date from t_bskt_frmly_drug_excpt a, t_excpt_code b, dma_rbate2.v_drug_remote c ,v_frmly d where a.excpt_id = b.excpt_id and a.bskt_gid = ? and d.frmly_gid = a.frmly_gid and c.drug_gid = a.drug_gid

update t_bskt_frmly_drug_excpt set eff_date = ? , end_date = ?, bskt_gid = ? ,frmly_gid = (select frmly_gid from v_frmly where upper(trim(frmly_extnl_id)) = ? ), excpt_id = (select excpt_id from t_excpt_code where upper(trim(excpt_rsn)) = ? ) ,drug_gid = (select drug_gid from dma_rbate2.v_drug_remote where upper(trim(ndc_code)) = ?) where ndc_excpt_gid = ?

select b.frmly_extnl_id,c.ndc_code,a.eff_date,a.end_date from t_fe_frmly_drug_date_excpt a, dma_rbate2.v_drug_remote c ,v_frmly b where a.frmly_gid = b.frmly_gid and a.drug_gid = c.drug_gid and a.cycle_gid = ? and a.bskt_gid = ?
select b.frmly_extnl_id, b.frmly_desc,a.eff_date,a.end_date from t_fe_frmly_drug_date a, v_frmly b where a.frmly_gid = b.frmly_gid and a.cycle_gid = ?
select b.frmly_extnl_id, b.frmly_desc,a.eff_date,a.end_date from t_fe_frmly_date a, v_frmly b where a.frmly_gid = b.frmly_gid and a.cycle_gid = ? and a.bskt_gid = ?

select b.frmly_extnl_id,a.err_crctn_gid,a.eff_date,a.end_date,a.extnl_src_code,a.extnl_lvl_id1,a.extnl_lvl_id2,a.extnl_lvl_id3,a.extnl_lvl_id4,a.extnl_lvl_id5,a.plan_code,a.lcm_code,a.rbate_id,a.orgnl_rbate_id, a.from_lcm_code from t_err_crctn a, v_frmly_all b where a.frmly_gid = b.frmly_gid(+)

select a.usr_gid,a.frst_nam,a.lst_nam,b.usr_privs_nam, a.email from t_usr a,t_usr_privs b where a.usr_privs_gid = b.usr_privs_gid and upper(trim(a.login_id)) = ? and exists (select 1 from t_usr a where upper(trim(a.login_id)) = ? and trim(a.psswd) = ? )

select i.inv_gid, i.cntrc_gid, i.rbate_cycle_gid, c.cycle_end_date, c.cycle_start_date from t_inv i, t_rbate_cycle c where i.rbate_cycle_gid = c.rbate_cycle_gid and i.inv_status = 'C' and cntrc_gid = ?

select c.rbate_cycle_gid,t.rbate_cycle_desc,c.cycle_start_date,c.cycle_end_date,c.rbate_cycle_status,c.alv_refresh_ind,c.rxc_refresh_ind,c.ruc_refresh_ind,c.cycle_lock_dt from dma_rbate2.t_rbate_cycle c, dma_rbate2.t_rbate_cycle_type t where c.rbate_cycle_type_id = t.rbate_cycle_type_id
update dma_rbate2.t_rbate_cycle set rbate_cycle_status = ?, alv_refresh_ind = ?, rxc_refresh_ind = ?, ruc_refresh_ind = ?, usr_gid = ? where rbate_cycle_gid = ?
select f.batch_gid, f.batch_date, f.cycle_gid, f.processed_ind, f.extnl_src_code , f.split_batch_ind from dma_rbate2.t_force_gather_cntl f
update dma_rbate2.t_force_gather_cntl set batch_date = ?, cycle_gid = ?, extnl_src_code = ?, usr_gid = ?, upd_date = ? where batch_gid = ?
insert into dma_rbate2.t_force_gather_cntl (batch_gid, batch_date, cycle_gid, extnl_src_code, usr_gid) values (?,?,?,?,?)
select ndc_code, drug_gid, threshold, mod_fctr from dma_rbate2.t_scrc_adjust_ndcs
update dma_rbate2.t_scrc_adjust_ndcs set threshold = ?, mod_fctr = ?, updt_dt = ?, usr_gid = ? where drug_gid = ?
select drug_gid from dma_rbate2.v_drug_remote where ndc_code = ?
SELECT list_rule_gid, lcm_code, prcdn_order, nabp_code, rbate_id, frmly_id FROM dma_rbate2.t_list_rule WHERE list_gid = ?
insert into dma_rbate2.t_list (list_gid, list_name, insrt_date, last_updt_usr) values (?,?, SYSDATE, ?)
update dma_rbate2.t_list set list_name = ?, last_updt_usr = ? where list_gid = ?
select c.pico_no, b.bskt_nam from dma_rbate2.t_rbate_lvl_rule r,dma_rbate2.t_bskt b,dma_rbate2.t_cntrc c WHERE r.bskt_gid = b.bskt_gid and b.cntrc_gid = c.cntrc_gid
insert into dma_rbate2.t_list_rule (list_rule_gid, list_gid, lcm_code, frmly_gid, prcdn_order, nabp_code, rbate_id, frmly_id,insrt_date, last_updt_usr) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, SYSDATE, ?)
select f.frmly_gid, f.frmly_desc from dma_rbate2.v_frmly f where f.frmly_desc = ?
